resources.string: this a long established fact that a reader will be distracted!\n by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
App developed by students Renata Leonel and\n Fábio Silva for the APP Programming course\n Catholic University of Brasilia, 2021-6

 - Internationalization of used strings
